title: Yes Bank in stake sale talks to give exit to its lenders
description: Yes Bank is working to provide an exit for shareholders, including SBI, as revealed by CEO Prashant Kumar. The bank has seen success in resolving bad loans and has experienced significant deposit growth. Kumar anticipates that Yes Bank's profitability will align with industry peers within 12-18 months, aided by released funds from the RIDF accounts.
